file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 53-21-05-04 - AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR GUIDES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR GUIDES - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the airstairs main door guides. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR GUIDES - RE- 53-21-05-000-801-A STAIRS MAIN DOOR MOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH AIR- AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR GUIDES - IN- 53-21-05-400-801-A STAIRS MAIN DOOR STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 53-21-05 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR 2. AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR GUIDES - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to remove the airstairs main door guides. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially No. 8 screwdriver bits for torq-set To remove the screws available screws E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the main door frames I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Open the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws from the airstairs main door guide. Refer to Figure 401. (2) Remove the airstairs main door guide and, if applicable, the damper. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-21-05 Page 2 of 5 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR Airstairs Main Door Guides - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A C DET. A 3 2 GUIDE 2 SCREW (2) 1 DET. C DAMPER (TYP) GUIDE 3 1 SCREW (2) DET. B (TYP) APPLY COR-BAN 27L TO THE SCREWS AND AT THE INTERFACE 1 BETWEEN THE DOOR FRAME AND THE DAMPER. APPLY COR-BAN 27L TO THE SCREWS AND AT THE INTERFACE 2 BETWEEN THE DOOR FRAME AND THE GUIDE. FOR AIRCRAFT POST-MOD SB145-53-0040 OR SB145-53-0088 3 APPLY ALODINE 1200S AND EPOXY PRIMER. EM145AMM530247D.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 53-21-05 Page 3 of 5 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 53-21-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR 3. AIRSTAIRS MAIN DOOR GUIDES - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure to install the airstairs main door guides. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM SDS 52-10-00/1 MAIN DOOR-TO-FUSELAGE SKIN GAP - ADJUST- AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-807-A/500 MENT S.B.145-53-0040 - S.B.145-53-0088 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 811 Main door D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially No. 8 screwdriver bits for torq-set To install the screws available screws E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) MEP 09-075 Corrosion-Inhibiting Compound (COR-BAN 27L) AR MIL-C-5541 Alodine 1200S AR MEP 10-059 Epoxy Primer AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task At the main door frames EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-21-05 Page 4 of 5 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A NOTE: Make sure that the door frame area where the door guide is installed does not show signs of corrosion. If it does, contact the EMBRAER Technical Support Department. (1) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-53-0040 or S.B.145-53-0088, do a chemical conversion touch-up of all bare metal surface in the holes with Alodine 1200S (Spec MIL-C-5541) and then apply Epoxy primer (Spec. MEP10-059). Refer to (Figure 401). WARNING: THE COR-BAN 27L CORROSION-INHIBITING COMPOUND IS TOXIC TO SKIN, EYES, AND RESPIRATORY TRACT. USE GOGGLES AND PROTECTIVE GLOVES. USE ONLY IN WELL VENTILATED AREAS. OBEY THE MANUFACTURER'S HEALTH AND SAFETY INSTRUCTIONS. (2) Apply COR-BAN 27L at the interface between the door frame and the damper or guide, as applicable, at the guide position. (3) Install the airstairs main door guide with the screws soaked in COR-BAN 27L. (4) Adjust the gap between the guides installed at the fuselage and at the door ( AMM TASK 52-10-01-820-807-A/500). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the main door (AMM SDS 52-10-00/1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 53-21-05 Page 5 of 5 Rev 52 - Apr 28/17 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
